function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discussion of indoor environment strategies and their impact on building operations","Impact":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate indoor environment strategies","Mitigation":"Implementing effective indoor environment strategies and building operation protocols to minimize the risk of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Air purification systems, ventilation control systems, UV disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Incompatibility of strategies between different certification categories (Fitwel, WELL, LEED)","Impact":"Inconsistent application of strategies may lead to gaps in disease mitigation and building health","Mitigation":"Addressing the incompatibility through comprehensive risk assessment and integration of strategies across categories","Technologies":"Integrated building management systems, data analytics for performance monitoring","People":"Certification organizations, building design and operations teams","Owner":"Certification organizations, building owners, facility management teams"},{"Description":"Exclusion of specific disease mitigation measures in certain certification standards (e.g., food and vaccines in WELL)","Impact":"Missing key measures for disease prevention and control in the built environment","Mitigation":"Developing and incorporating comprehensive disease mitigation measures into all certification standards","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, disease tracking and forecasting tools","People":"Public health authorities, certification organizations, building occupants","Owner":"Certification organizations, building owners"}]}
